name: Get Guild Audit Log
description: Returns an audit log object for the guild. Requires the 'VIEW_AUDIT_LOG' permission.

props.name: user_id
props.description: filter the log for actions made by a user

props.name: action_type
props.description: the type of audit log event

props.name: before
props.description: filter the log before a certain entry id

props.name: limit
props.description: how many entries are returned (default 50, minimum 1, maximum 100)

name: Get Channel
description: Get a channel by ID. Returns a channel object. If the channel is a thread, a thread member object is included in the returned result.

name: Modify Channel
description: Update a channel's settings. Returns a channel on success, and a 400 BAD REQUEST on invalid parameters. All JSON parameters are optional.

props.name: name
props.description: 1-100 character channel name

props.name: icon
props.description: base64 encoded icon

props.name: name
props.description: 1-100 character channel name

props.name: type
props.description: the type of channel; only conversion between text and news is supported and only in guilds with the "NEWS" feature

props.name: position
props.description: the position of the channel in the left-hand ing

props.name: topic
props.description: 0-1024 character channel topic

props.name: nsfw
props.description: whether the channel is nsfw

props.name: rate_limit_per_user
props.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600); bots, as well as users with the permission manage_messages or manage_channel, are unaffected

props.name: bitrate
props.description: the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel; 8000 to 96000 (128000 for VIP servers)

props.name: user_limit
props.description: the user limit of the voice channel; 0 refers to no limit, 1 to 99 refers to a user limit

props.name: permission_overwrites
props.description: channel or category-specific permissions

props.name: parent_id
props.description: id of the new parent category for a channel

props.name: rtc_region
props.description: channel voice region id, automatic when set to null

props.name: video_quality_mode
props.description: the camera video quality mode of the voice channel

props.name: default_auto_archive_duration
props.description: the default duration that the clients use (not the API) for newly created threads in the channel, in minutes, to automatically archive the thread after recent activity

props.name: name
props.description: 1-100 character channel name

props.name: archived
props.description: whether the thread is archived

props.name: auto_archive_duration
props.description: duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread after recent activity, can be set to: 60, 1440, 4320, 10080

props.name: locked
props.description: whether the thread is locked; when a thread is locked, only users with MANAGE_THREADS can unarchive it

props.name: invitable
props.description: whether non-moderators can add other non-moderators to a thread; only available on private threads

props.name: rate_limit_per_user
props.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600); bots, as well as users with the permission manage_messages, manage_thread, or manage_channel, are unaffected

name: Delete/Close Channel
description: Delete a channel, or close a private message. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission for the guild, or MANAGE_THREADS if the channel is a thread. Deleting a category does not delete its child channels; they will have their parent_id removed and a Channel Update Gateway event will fire for each of them. Returns a channel object on success. Fires a Channel Delete Gateway event (or Thread Delete if the channel was a thread).

name: Get Channel Messages
description: Returns the messages for a channel. If operating on a guild channel, this endpoint requires the VIEW_CHANNEL permission to be present on the current user. If the current user is missing the 'READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY' permission in the channel then this will return no messages (since they cannot read the message history). Returns an array of message objects on success.

props.name: around
props.description: get messages around this message ID

props.name: before
props.description: get messages before this message ID

props.name: after
props.description: get messages after this message ID

props.name: limit
props.description: max number of messages to return (1-100)

name: Get Channel Message
description: Returns a specific message in the channel. If operating on a guild channel, this endpoint requires the 'READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY' permission to be present on the current user. Returns a message object on success.

name: Create Message
description: Post a message to a guild text or DM channel. Returns a message object. Fires a Message Create Gateway event. See message formatting for more information on how to properly format messages.

props.name: content
props.description: the message contents (up to 2000 characters)

props.name: tts
props.description: true if this is a TTS message

props.name: embeds
props.description: embedded rich content (up to 6000 characters)

props.name: embed
props.description: embedded rich content, deprecated in favor of embeds

props.name: allowed_mentions
props.description: allowed mentions for the message

props.name: message_reference
props.description: include to make your message a reply

props.name: components
props.description: the components to include with the message

props.name: sticker_ids
props.description: IDs of up to 3 stickers in the server to send in the message

props.name: files
props.description: the contents of the file being sent

props.name: payload_json
props.description: JSON encoded body of non-file params

props.name: attachments
props.description: attachment objects with filename and description

props.name: flags
props.description: message flags combined as a bitfield (only SUPPRESS_EMBEDS can be set)

name: Crosspost Message
description: Crosspost a message in a News Channel to following channels. This endpoint requires the 'SEND_MESSAGES' permission, if the current user sent the message, or additionally the 'MANAGE_MESSAGES' permission, for all other messages, to be present for the current user.

name: Create Reaction
description: Create a reaction for the message. This endpoint requires the 'READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY' permission to be present on the current user. Additionally, if nobody else has reacted to the message using this emoji, this endpoint requires the 'ADD_REACTIONS' permission to be present on the current user. Returns a 204 empty response on success. The emoji must be URL Encoded or the request will fail with 10014: Unknown Emoji. To use custom emoji, you must encode it in the format name:id with the emoji name and emoji id.

name: Delete Own Reaction
description: Delete a reaction the current user has made for the message. Returns a 204 empty response on success. The emoji must be URL Encoded or the request will fail with 10014: Unknown Emoji. To use custom emoji, you must encode it in the format name:id with the emoji name and emoji id.

name: Delete User Reaction
description: Deletes another user's reaction. This endpoint requires the 'MANAGE_MESSAGES' permission to be present on the current user. Returns a 204 empty response on success. The emoji must be URL Encoded or the request will fail with 10014: Unknown Emoji. To use custom emoji, you must encode it in the format name:id with the emoji name and emoji id.

name: Get Reactions
description: Get a list of users that reacted with this emoji. Returns an array of user objects on success. The emoji must be URL Encoded or the request will fail with 10014: Unknown Emoji. To use custom emoji, you must encode it in the format name:id with the emoji name and emoji id.

props.name: after
props.description: get users after this user ID

props.name: limit
props.description: max number of users to return (1-100)

name: Delete All Reactions
description: Deletes all reactions on a message. This endpoint requires the 'MANAGE_MESSAGES' permission to be present on the current user. Fires a Message Reaction Remove All Gateway event.

name: Delete All Reactions for Emoji
description: Deletes all the reactions for a given emoji on a message. This endpoint requires the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission to be present on the current user. Fires a Message Reaction Remove Emoji Gateway event. The emoji must be URL Encoded or the request will fail with 10014: Unknown Emoji. To use custom emoji, you must encode it in the format name:id with the emoji name and emoji id.

name: Edit Message
description: Edit a previously sent message. The fields content, embeds, and flags can be edited by the original message author. Other users can only edit flags and only if they have the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission in the corresponding channel. When specifying flags, ensure to include all previously set flags/bits in addition to ones that you are modifying. Only flags documented in the table below may be modified by users (unsupported flag changes are currently ignored without error).

props.name: content
props.description: the message contents (up to 2000 characters)

props.name: embeds
props.description: embedded rich content (up to 6000 characters)

props.name: embed
props.description: embedded rich content, deprecated in favor of embeds

props.name: flags
props.description: edit the flags of a message (only SUPPRESS_EMBEDS can currently be set/unset)

props.name: allowed_mentions
props.description: allowed mentions for the message

props.name: components
props.description: the components to include with the message

props.name: files
props.description: the contents of the file being sent/edited

props.name: payload_json
props.description: JSON encoded body of non-file params (multipart/form-data only)

props.name: attachments
props.description: attached files to keep and possible descriptions for new files

name: Delete Message
description: Delete a message. If operating on a guild channel and trying to delete a message that was not sent by the current user, this endpoint requires the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Message Delete Gateway event.

name: Bulk Delete Messages
description: Delete multiple messages in a single request. This endpoint can only be used on guild channels and requires the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Message Delete Bulk Gateway event.

props.name: messages
props.description: message ids to delete (2-100)

name: Edit Channel Permissions
description: Edit the channel permission overwrites for a user or role in a channel. Only usable for guild channels. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Only permissions your bot has in the guild or channel can be allowed/denied (unless your bot has a MANAGE_ROLES overwrite in the channel). Returns a 204 empty response on success. For more information about permissions, see permissions.

props.name: allow
props.description: the bitwise value of all allowed permissions (default "0")

props.name: deny
props.description: the bitwise value of all disallowed permissions (default "0")

props.name: type
props.description: 0 for a role or 1 for a member

name: Get Channel Invites
description: Returns a list of invite objects (with invite metadata) for the channel. Only usable for guild channels. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission.

name: Create Channel Invite
description: Create a new invite object for the channel. Only usable for guild channels. Requires the CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE permission. All JSON parameters for this route are optional, however the request body is not. If you are not sending any fields, you still have to send an empty JSON object ({}). Returns an invite object. Fires an Invite Create Gateway event.

props.name: max_age
props.description: duration of invite in seconds before expiry, or 0 for never. between 0 and 604800 (7 days)

props.name: max_uses
props.description: max number of uses or 0 for unlimited. between 0 and 100

props.name: temporary
props.description: whether this invite only grants temporary membership

props.name: unique
props.description: if true, don't try to reuse a similar invite (useful for creating many unique one time use invites)

props.name: target_type
props.description: the type of target for this voice channel invite

props.name: target_user_id
props.description: the id of the user whose stream to display for this invite, required if target_type is 1, the user must be streaming in the channel

props.name: target_application_id
props.description: the id of the embedded application to open for this invite, required if target_type is 2, the application must have the EMBEDDED flag

name: Delete Channel Permission
description: Delete a channel permission overwrite for a user or role in a channel. Only usable for guild channels. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. For more information about permissions, see permissions

name: Follow News Channel
description: Follow a News Channel to send messages to a target channel. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission in the target channel. Returns a followed channel object.

props.name: webhook_channel_id
props.description: id of target channel

name: Trigger Typing Indicator
description: Post a typing indicator for the specified channel. Generally bots should not implement this route. However, if a bot is responding to a command and expects the computation to take a few seconds, this endpoint may be called to let the user know that the bot is processing their message. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Typing Start Gateway event.

name: Get Pinned Messages
description: Returns all pinned messages in the channel as an array of message objects.

name: Pin Message
description: Pin a message in a channel. Requires the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success.

name: Unpin Message
description: Unpin a message in a channel. Requires the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success.

name: Group DM Add Recipient
description: Adds a recipient to a Group DM using their access token.

props.name: access_token
props.description: access token of a user that has granted your app the gdm.join scope

props.name: nick
props.description: nickname of the user being added

name: Group DM Remove Recipient
description: Removes a recipient from a Group DM.

name: Start Thread with Message
description: Creates a new thread from an existing message. Returns a channel on success, and a 400 BAD REQUEST on invalid parameters. Fires a Thread Create Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: 1-100 character channel name

props.name: auto_archive_duration
props.description: duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread after recent activity, can be set to: 60, 1440, 4320, 10080

props.name: rate_limit_per_user
props.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600)

name: Start Thread without Message
description: Creates a new thread that is not connected to an existing message. The created thread defaults to a GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD*. Returns a channel on success, and a 400 BAD REQUEST on invalid parameters. Fires a Thread Create Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: 1-100 character channel name

props.name: auto_archive_duration
props.description: duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread after recent activity, can be set to: 60, 1440, 4320, 10080

props.name: type
props.description: the type of thread to create

props.name: invitable
props.description: whether non-moderators can add other non-moderators to a thread; only available when creating a private thread

props.name: rate_limit_per_user
props.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600)

name: Join Thread
description: Adds the current user to a thread. Also requires the thread is not archived. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Thread Members Update Gateway event.

name: Add Thread Member
description: Adds another member to a thread. Requires the ability to send messages in the thread. Also requires the thread is not archived. Returns a 204 empty response if the member is successfully added or was already a member of the thread. Fires a Thread Members Update Gateway event.

name: Leave Thread
description: Removes the current user from a thread. Also requires the thread is not archived. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Thread Members Update Gateway event.

name: Remove Thread Member
description: Removes another member from a thread. Requires the MANAGE_THREADS permission, or the creator of the thread if it is a GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD. Also requires the thread is not archived. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Thread Members Update Gateway event.

name: Get Thread Member
description: Returns a thread member object for the specified user if they are a member of the thread, returns a 404 response otherwise.

name: List Thread Members
description: Returns array of thread members objects that are members of the thread.

name: List Active Threads
description: Returns all active threads in the channel, including public and private threads. Threads are ordered by their id, in descending order.

name: List Public Archived Threads
description: Returns archived threads in the channel that are public. When called on a GUILD_TEXT channel, returns threads of type GUILD_PUBLIC_THREAD. When called on a GUILD_NEWS channel returns threads of type GUILD_NEWS_THREAD. Threads are ordered by archive_timestamp, in descending order. Requires the READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY permission.

props.name: before
props.description: returns threads before this timestamp

props.name: limit
props.description: optional maximum number of threads to return

name: List Private Archived Threads
description: Returns archived threads in the channel that are of type GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD. Threads are ordered by archive_timestamp, in descending order. Requires both the READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY and MANAGE_THREADS permissions.

props.name: before
props.description: returns threads before this timestamp

props.name: limit
props.description: optional maximum number of threads to return

name: List Joined Private Archived Threads
description: Returns archived threads in the channel that are of type GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD, and the user has joined. Threads are ordered by their id, in descending order. Requires the READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY permission.

props.name: before
props.description: returns threads before this id

props.name: limit
props.description: optional maximum number of threads to return

name: List Guild Emojis
description: Returns a list of emoji objects for the given guild.

name: Get Guild Emoji
description: Returns an emoji object for the given guild and emoji IDs.

name: Create Guild Emoji
description: Create a new emoji for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns the new emoji object on success. Fires a Guild Emojis Update Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the emoji

props.name: image
props.description: the 128x128 emoji image

props.name: roles
props.description: roles allowed to use this emoji

name: Modify Guild Emoji
description: Modify the given emoji. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns the updated emoji object on success. Fires a Guild Emojis Update Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the emoji

props.name: roles
props.description: roles allowed to use this emoji

name: Delete Guild Emoji
description: Delete the given emoji. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns 204 No Content on success. Fires a Guild Emojis Update Gateway event.

name: Create Guild
description: Create a new guild. Returns a guild object on success. Fires a Guild Create Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the guild (2-100 characters)

props.name: region
props.description: voice region id

props.name: icon
props.description: base64 128x128 image for the guild icon

props.name: verification_level
props.description: verification level

props.name: default_message_notifications
props.description: default message notification level

props.name: explicit_content_filter
props.description: explicit content filter level

props.name: roles
props.description: new guild roles

props.name: channels
props.description: new guild's channels

props.name: afk_channel_id
props.description: id for afk channel

props.name: afk_timeout
props.description: afk timeout in seconds

props.name: system_channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

props.name: system_channel_flags
props.description: system channel flags

name: Get Guild
description: Returns the guild object for the given id. If with_counts is set to true, this endpoint will also return approximate_member_count and approximate_presence_count for the guild.

props.name: with_counts
props.description: when true, will return approximate member and presence counts for the guild

name: Get Guild Preview
description: Returns the guild preview object for the given id. If the user is not in the guild, then the guild must be lurkable.

name: Modify Guild
description: Modify a guild's settings. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated guild object on success. Fires a Guild Update Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: guild name

props.name: region
props.description: guild voice region id

props.name: verification_level
props.description: verification level

props.name: default_message_notifications
props.description: default message notification level

props.name: explicit_content_filter
props.description: explicit content filter level

props.name: afk_channel_id
props.description: id for afk channel

props.name: afk_timeout
props.description: afk timeout in seconds

props.name: icon
props.description: base64 1024x1024 png/jpeg/gif image for the guild icon (can be animated gif when the server has the ANIMATED_ICON feature)

props.name: owner_id
props.description: user id to transfer guild ownership to (must be owner)

props.name: splash
props.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild splash (when the server has the INVITE_SPLASH feature)

props.name: discovery_splash
props.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild discovery splash (when the server has the DISCOVERABLE feature)

props.name: banner
props.description: base64 16:9 png/jpeg image for the guild banner (when the server has the BANNER feature)

props.name: system_channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel where guild notices such as welcome messages and boost events are posted

props.name: system_channel_flags
props.description: system channel flags

props.name: rules_channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel where Community guilds display rules and/or guidelines

props.name: public_updates_channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel where admins and moderators of Community guilds receive notices from Discord

props.name: preferred_locale
props.description: the preferred locale of a Community guild used in server discovery and notices from Discord; defaults to "en-US

props.name: features
props.description: enabled guild features

props.name: description
props.description: the description for the guild, if the guild is discoverable

props.name: premium_progress_bar_enabled
props.description: whether the guild's boost progress bar should be enabled.

name: Delete Guild
description: Delete a guild permanently. User must be owner. Returns 204 No Content on success. Fires a Guild Delete Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Channels
description: Returns a list of guild channel objects. Does not include threads.

name: Create Guild Channel
description: Create a new channel object for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission. If setting permission overwrites, only permissions your bot has in the guild can be allowed/denied. Setting MANAGE_ROLES permission in channels is only possible for guild administrators. Returns the new channel object on success. Fires a Channel Create Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: channel name (1-100 characters)

props.name: type
props.description: the type of channel

props.name: topic
props.description: channel topic (0-1024 characters)

props.name: bitrate
props.description: the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel (voice only)

props.name: user_limit
props.description: the user limit of the voice channel (voice only)

props.name: rate_limit_per_user
props.description: amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600); bots, as well as users with the permission manage_messages or manage_channel, are unaffected

props.name: position
props.description: sorting position of the channel

props.name: permission_overwrites
props.description: the channel's permission overwrites

props.name: parent_id
props.description: id of the parent category for a channel

props.name: nsfw
props.description: whether the channel is nsfw

name: Modify Guild Channel Positions
description: Modify the positions of a set of channel objects for the guild. Requires MANAGE_CHANNELS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires multiple Channel Update Gateway events.

props.name: id
props.description: channel id

props.name: position
props.description: sorting position of the channel

props.name: lock_permissions
props.description: syncs the permission overwrites with the new parent, if moving to a new category

props.name: parent_id
props.description: the new parent ID for the channel that is moved

name: List Active Threads
description: Returns all active threads in the guild, including public and private threads. Threads are ordered by their id, in descending order.

name: Get Guild Member
description: Returns a guild member object for the specified user.

name: List Guild Members
description: Returns a list of guild member objects that are members of the guild.

props.name: limit
props.description: max number of members to return (1-1000)

props.name: after
props.description: the highest user id in the previous page

name: Search Guild Members
description: Returns a list of guild member objects whose username or nickname starts with a provided string.

props.name: query
props.description: Query string to match username(s) and nickname(s) against.

props.name: limit
props.description: max number of members to return (1-1000)

name: Add Guild Member
description: Adds a user to the guild, provided you have a valid oauth2 access token for the user with the guilds.join scope. Returns a 201 Created with the guild member as the body, or 204 No Content if the user is already a member of the guild. Fires a Guild Member Add Gateway event.

props.name: access_token
props.description: an oauth2 access token granted with the guilds.join to the bot's application for the user you want to add to the guild

props.name: nick
props.description: value to set user's nickname to

props.name: roles
props.description: role ids the member is assigned

props.name: mute
props.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels

props.name: deaf
props.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels

name: Modify Guild Member
description: Modify attributes of a guild member. Returns a 200 OK with the guild member as the body. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event. If the channel_id is set to null, this will force the target user to be disconnected from voice.

props.name: nick
props.description: value to set user's nickname to

props.name: roles
props.description: role ids the member is assigned

props.name: mute
props.description: whether the user is muted in voice channels. Will throw a 400 error if the user is not in a voice channel

props.name: deaf
props.description: whether the user is deafened in voice channels. Will throw a 400 error if the user is not in a voice channel

props.name: channel_id
props.description: id of channel to move user to (if they are connected to voice)

props.name: communication_disabled_until
props.description: when the user's timeout will expire and the user will be able to communicate in the guild again (up to 28 days in the future), set to null to remove timeout. Will throw a 403 error if the user has the ADMINISTRATOR permission or is the owner of the guild

name: Modify Current Member
description: Modifies the current member in a guild. Returns a 200 with the updated member object on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

props.name: nick
props.description: value to set user's nickname to

name: Modify Current User Nick
description: Modifies the nickname of the current user in a guild. Returns a 200 with the nickname on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

props.name: nick
props.description: value to set user's nickname to

name: Add Guild Member Role
description: Adds a role to a guild member. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

name: Remove Guild Member Role
description: Removes a role from a guild member. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Update Gateway event.

name: Remove Guild Member
description: Remove a member from a guild. Requires KICK_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Member Remove Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Bans
description: Returns a list of ban objects for the users banned from this guild. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission.

name: Get Guild Ban
description: Returns a ban object for the given user or a 404 not found if the ban cannot be found. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission.

name: Create Guild Ban
description: Create a guild ban, and optionally delete previous messages sent by the banned user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Add Gateway event.

props.name: delete_message_days
props.description: number of days to delete messages for (0-7)

props.name: reason
props.description: reason for the ban

name: Remove Guild Ban
description: Remove the ban for a user. Requires the BAN_MEMBERS permissions. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Ban Remove Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Roles
description: Returns a list of role objects for the guild.

name: Create Guild Role
description: Create a new role for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns the new role object on success. Fires a Guild Role Create Gateway event. All JSON params are optional.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the role

props.name: permissions
props.description: bitwise value of the enabled/disabled permissions

props.name: color
props.description: RGB color value

props.name: hoist
props.description: whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

props.name: icon
props.description: the role's icon image (if the guild has the ROLE_ICONS feature)

props.name: unicode_emoji
props.description: the role's unicode emoji as a standard emoji (if the guild has the ROLE_ICONS feature)

props.name: mentionable
props.description: whether the role should be mentionable

name: Modify Guild Role Positions
description: Modify the positions of a set of role objects for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a list of all of the guild's role objects on success. Fires multiple Guild Role Update Gateway events.

props.name: id
props.description: role

props.name: position
props.description: sorting position of the role

name: Modify Guild Role
description: Modify a guild role. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns the updated role on success. Fires a Guild Role Update Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the role

props.name: permissions
props.description: bitwise value of the enabled/disabled permissions

props.name: color
props.description: RGB color value

props.name: hoist
props.description: whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

props.name: icon
props.description: the role's icon image (if the guild has the ROLE_ICONS feature)

props.name: unicode_emoji
props.description: the role's unicode emoji as a standard emoji (if the guild has the ROLE_ICONS feature)

props.name: mentionable
props.description: whether the role should be mentionable

name: Delete Guild Role
description: Delete a guild role. Requires the MANAGE_ROLES permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Role Delete Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Prune Count
description: Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that would be removed in a prune operation. Requires the KICK_MEMBERS permission.

props.name: days
props.description: number of days to count prune for (1-30)

props.name: include_roles
props.description: role(s) to include

name: Begin Guild Prune
description: Begin a prune operation. Requires the KICK_MEMBERS permission. Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that were removed in the prune operation. For large guilds it's recommended to set the compute_prune_count option to false, forcing 'pruned' to null. Fires multiple Guild Member Remove Gateway events.

props.name: days
props.description: number of days to prune (1-30)

props.name: compute_prune_count
props.description: whether 'pruned' is returned, discouraged for large guilds

props.name: include_roles
props.description: role(s) to include

props.name: reason
props.description: reason for the prune

name: Get Guild Voice Regions
description: Returns a list of voice region objects for the guild. Unlike the similar /voice route, this returns VIP servers when the guild is VIP-enabled.

name: Get Guild Invites
description: Returns a list of invite objects (with invite metadata) for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Get Guild Integrations
description: Returns a list of integration objects for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Delete Guild Integration
description: Delete the attached integration object for the guild. Deletes any associated webhooks and kicks the associated bot if there is one. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns a 204 empty response on success. Fires a Guild Integrations Update Gateway event.

name: Get Guild Widget Settings
description: Returns a guild widget settings object. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Modify Guild Widget
description: Modify a guild widget settings object for the guild. All attributes may be passed in with JSON and modified. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated guild widget object.

name: Get Guild Widget
description: Returns the widget for the guild.

name: Get Guild Vanity URL
description: Returns a partial invite object for guilds with that feature enabled. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. code will be null if a vanity url for the guild is not set.

name: Get Guild Widget Image
description: Returns a PNG image widget for the guild. Requires no permissions or authentication.

props.name: style
props.description: style of the widget image returned (see below)

name: Get Guild Welcome Screen
description: Returns the Welcome Screen object for the guild. If the welcome screen is not enabled, the MANAGE_GUILD permission is required.

name: Modify Guild Welcome Screen
description: Modify the guild's Welcome Screen. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the updated Welcome Screen object.

props.name: enabled
props.description: whether the welcome screen is enabled

props.name: welcome_channels
props.description: channels linked in the welcome screen and their display options

props.name: description
props.description: the server description to show in the welcome screen

name: Modify Current User Voice State
description: Updates the current user's voice state.

props.name: channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel the user is currently in

props.name: suppress
props.description: toggles the user's suppress state

props.name: request_to_speak_timestamp
props.description: sets the user's request to speak

name: Modify User Voice State
description: Updates another user's voice state.

props.name: channel_id
props.description: the id of the channel the user is currently in

props.name: suppress
props.description: toggles the user's suppress state

name: List Scheduled Events for Guild
description: Returns a list of guild scheduled event objects for the given guild.

props.name: with_user_count
props.description: include number of users subscribed to each event

name: Create Guild Scheduled Event
description: Create a guild scheduled event in the guild. Returns a guild scheduled event object on success.

props.name: channel_id
props.description: the channel id of the scheduled event.

props.name: entity_metadata
props.description: the entity metadata of the scheduled event

props.name: name
props.description: the name of the scheduled event

props.name: privacy_level
props.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

props.name: scheduled_start_time
props.description: the time to schedule the scheduled event

props.name: scheduled_end_time
props.description: the time when the scheduled event is scheduled to end

props.name: description
props.description: the description of the scheduled event

props.name: entity_type
props.description: the entity type of the scheduled event

props.name: image
props.description: the cover image of the scheduled event

name: Get Guild Scheduled Event
description: Get a guild scheduled event. Returns a guild scheduled event object on success.

props.name: with_user_count
props.description: include number of users subscribed to this event

name: Modify Guild Scheduled Event
description: Modify a guild scheduled event. Returns the modified guild scheduled event object on success.

props.name: channel_id
props.description: the channel id of the scheduled event, set to null if changing entity type to EXTERNAL

props.name: entity_metadata
props.description: the entity metadata of the scheduled event

props.name: name
props.description: the name of the scheduled event

props.name: privacy_level
props.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

props.name: scheduled_start_time
props.description: the time to schedule the scheduled event

props.name: scheduled_end_time
props.description: the time when the scheduled event is scheduled to end

props.name: description
props.description: the description of the scheduled event

props.name: entity_type
props.description: the entity type of the scheduled event

props.name: status
props.description: the status of the scheduled event

props.name: image
props.description: the cover image of the scheduled event

name: Delete Guild Scheduled Event
description: Delete a guild scheduled event. Returns a 204 on success.

name: Get Guild Scheduled Event Users
description: Get a list of guild scheduled event users subscribed to a guild scheduled event. Returns a list of guild scheduled event user objects on success. Guild member data, if it exists, is included if the with_member query parameter is set.

props.name: limit
props.description: number of users to return (up to maximum 100)

props.name: with_member
props.description: include guild member data if it exists

props.name: before
props.description: consider only users before given user id

props.name: after
props.description: consider only users after given user id

name: Get Guild Template
description: Returns a guild template object for the given code.

name: Create Guild from Guild Template
description: Create a new guild based on a template. Returns a guild object on success. Fires a Guild Create Gateway event.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the guild (2-100 characters)

props.name: icon
props.description: base64 128x128 image for the guild icon

name: Get Guild Templates
description: Returns an array of guild template objects. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission.

name: Create Guild Template
description: Creates a template for the guild. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the created guild template object on success.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the template (1-100 characters)

props.name: description
props.description: description for the template (0-120 characters)

name: Sync Guild Template
description: Syncs the template to the guild's current state. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the guild template object on success.

name: Modify Guild Template
description: Modifies the template's metadata. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the guild template object on success.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the template (1-100 characters)

props.name: description
props.description: description for the template (0-120 characters)

name: Delete Guild Template
description: Deletes the template. Requires the MANAGE_GUILD permission. Returns the deleted guild template object on success.

name: Get Invite
description: Returns an invite object for the given code.

props.name: with_counts
props.description: whether the invite should contain approximate member counts

props.name: with_expiration
props.description: whether the invite should contain the expiration date

props.name: guild_scheduled_event_id
props.description: the guild scheduled event to include with the invite

name: Delete Invite
description: Delete an invite. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission on the channel this invite belongs to, or MANAGE_GUILD to remove any invite across the guild. Returns an invite object on success. Fires a Invite Delete Gateway event.

name: Create Stage Instance
description: Creates a new Stage instance associated to a Stage channel.

props.name: channel_id
props.description: The id of the Stage channel

props.name: topic
props.description: The topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)

props.name: privacy_level
props.description: The privacy level of the Stage instance (default GUILD_ONLY)

name: Get Stage Instance
description: Gets the stage instance associated with the Stage channel, if it exists.

name: Modify Stage Instance
description: Updates fields of an existing Stage instance.

props.name: topic
props.description: The topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)

props.name: privacy_level
props.description: The privacy level of the Stage instance

name: Delete Stage Instance
description: Deletes the Stage instance.

name: Get Sticker
description: Returns a sticker object for the given sticker ID.

name: List Nitro Sticker Packs
description: Returns the list of sticker packs available to Nitro subscribers.

name: List Guild Stickers
description: Returns an array of sticker objects for the given guild. Includes user fields if the bot has the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission.

name: Get Guild Sticker
description: Returns a sticker object for the given guild and sticker IDs. Includes the user field if the bot has the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission.

name: Create Guild Sticker
description: Create a new sticker for the guild. Send a multipart/form-data body. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns the new sticker object on success.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the sticker (2-30 characters)

props.name: description
props.description: description of the sticker (empty or 2-100 characters)

props.name: tags
props.description: autocomplete/suggestion tags for the sticker (max 200 characters)

props.name: file
props.description: the sticker file to upload, must be a PNG, APNG, or Lottie JSON file, max 500 KB

name: Modify Guild Sticker
description: Modify the given sticker. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns the updated sticker object on success.

props.name: name
props.description: name of the sticker (2-30 characters)

props.name: description
props.description: description of the sticker (2-100 characters)

props.name: tags
props.description: autocomplete/suggestion tags for the sticker (max 200 characters)

name: Delete Guild Sticker
description: Delete the given sticker. Requires the MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS permission. Returns 204 No Content on success.

name: Get Current User
description: Returns the user object of the requester's account. For OAuth2, this requires the identify scope, which will return the object without an email, and optionally the email scope, which returns the object with an email.

name: Get User
description: Returns a user object for a given user ID.

name: Modify Current User
description: Modify the requester's user account settings. Returns a user object on success.

props.name: username
props.description: user's username, if changed may cause the user's discriminator to be randomized.

props.name: avatar
props.description: if passed, modifies the user's avatar

name: Get Current User Guilds
description: Returns a list of partial guild objects the current user is a member of. Requires the guilds OAuth2 scope.

props.name: before
props.description: get guilds before this guild ID

props.name: after
props.description: get guilds after this guild ID

props.name: limit
props.description: max number of guilds to return (1-200)

name: Get Current User Guild Member
description: Returns a guild member object for the current user. Requires the guilds.members.read OAuth2 scope.

name: Leave Guild
description: Leave a guild. Returns a 204 empty response on success.

name: Create DM
description: Create a new DM channel with a user. Returns a DM channel object.

props.name: recipient_id
props.description: the recipient to open a DM channel with

name: Create Group DM
description: Create a new group DM channel with multiple users. Returns a DM channel object. This endpoint was intended to be used with the now-deprecated GameBridge SDK. DMs created with this endpoint will not be shown in the Discord client

props.name: access_tokens
props.description: access tokens of users that have granted your app the gdm.join scope

props.name: nicks
props.description: a dictionary of user ids to their respective nicknames

name: Get User Connections
description: Returns a list of connection objects. Requires the connections OAuth2 scope.

name: List Voice Regions
description: Returns an array of voice region objects that can be used when setting a voice or stage channel's `rtc_region`.

name: Create Webhook
description: Create a new webhook. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission. Returns a webhook object on success. Webhook names follow our naming restrictions that can be found in our Usernames and Nicknames documentation, with the following additional stipulations:

props.name: name
props.description: name of the webhook (1-80 characters)

props.name: avatar
props.description: image for the default webhook avatar

name: Get Channel Webhooks
description: Returns a list of channel webhook objects. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission.

name: Get Guild Webhooks
description: Returns a list of guild webhook objects. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission.

name: Get Webhook
description: Returns the new webhook object for the given id.

name: Get Webhook with Token
description: Same as above, except this call does not require authentication and returns no user in the webhook object.

name: Modify Webhook
description: Modify a webhook. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission. Returns the updated webhook object on success.

props.name: name
props.description: the default name of the webhook

props.name: avatar
props.description: image for the default webhook avatar

props.name: channel_id
props.description: the new channel id this webhook should be moved to

name: Modify Webhook with Token
description: Same as above, except this call does not require authentication, does not accept a channel_id parameter in the body, and does not return a user in the webhook object.

name: Delete Webhook
description: Delete a webhook permanently. Requires the MANAGE_WEBHOOKS permission. Returns a 204 No Content response on success.

name: Delete Webhook with Token
description: Same as above, except this call does not require authentication.

name: Execute Webhook
description: Refer to Uploading Files for details on attachments and multipart/form-data requests.

props.name: wait
props.description: waits for server confirmation of message send before response, and returns the created message body (defaults to false; when false a message that is not saved does not return an error)

props.name: thread_id
props.description: Send a message to the specified thread within a webhook's channel. The thread will automatically be unarchived.

props.name: content
props.description: the message contents (up to 2000 characters)

props.name: username
props.description: override the default username of the webhook

props.name: avatar_url
props.description: override the default avatar of the webhook

props.name: tts
props.description: true if this is a TTS message

props.name: embeds
props.description: embedded rich content

props.name: allowed_mentions
props.description: allowed mentions for the message

props.name: components
props.description: the components to include with the message

props.name: files
props.description: the contents of the file being sent

props.name: payload_json
props.description: JSON encoded body of non-file params

props.name: attachments
props.description: attachment objects with filename and description

props.name: flags
props.description: message flags combined as a bitfield (only SUPPRESS_EMBEDS can be set)

name: Execute Slack-Compatible Webhook
description: Refer to Slack's documentation for more information. We do not support Slack's channel, icon_emoji, mrkdwn, or mrkdwn_in properties.

props.name: thread_id
props.description: id of the thread to send the message in

props.name: wait
props.description: waits for server confirmation of message send before response (defaults to true; when false a message that is not saved does not return an error)

name: Execute GitHub-Compatible Webhook
description: Add a new webhook to your GitHub repo (in the repo's settings), and use this endpoint as the "Payload URL." You can choose what events your Discord channel receives by choosing the "Let me select individual events" option and selecting individual events for the new webhook you're configuring.

props.name: thread_id
props.description: id of the thread to send the message in

props.name: wait
props.description: waits for server confirmation of message send before response (defaults to true; when false a message that is not saved does not return an error)

name: Get Webhook Message
description: Returns a previously-sent webhook message from the same token. Returns a message object on success.

props.name: thread_id
props.description: id of the thread the message is in

name: Edit Webhook Message
description: Edits a previously-sent webhook message from the same token. Returns a message object on success.

props.name: thread_id
props.description: id of the thread the message is in

props.name: content
props.description: the message contents (up to 2000 characters)

props.name: embeds
props.description: embedded rich content

props.name: allowed_mentions
props.description: allowed mentions for the message

props.name: components
props.description: the components to include with the message

props.name: files
props.description: the contents of the file being sent/edited

props.name: payload_json
props.description: JSON encoded body of non-file params (multipart/form-data only)

props.name: attachments
props.description: attached files to keep and possible descriptions for new files

name: Delete Webhook Message
description: Deletes a message that was created by the webhook. Returns a 204 No Content response on success.

props.name: thread_id
props.description: id of the thread the message is in

name: Get Gateway
description: Returns an object with a single valid WSS URL, which the client can use for Connecting. Clients should cache this value and only call this endpoint to retrieve a new URL if they are unable to properly establish a connection using the cached version of the URL.

name: Get Gateway Bot
description: Returns an object based on the information in Get Gateway, plus additional metadata that can help during the operation of large or sharded bots. Unlike the Get Gateway, this route should not be cached for extended periods of time as the value is not guaranteed to be the same per-call, and changes as the bot joins/leaves guilds.

props.name: url
props.description: The WSS URL that can be used for connecting to the gateway

props.name: shards
props.description: The recommended number of shards to use when connecting

props.name: session_start_limit
props.description: Information on the current session start limit

name: Get Current Bot Application Information
description: Returns the bot's application object.

name: Get Current Authorization Information
description: Returns info about the current authorization. Requires authentication with a bearer token.

props.name: application
props.description: the current application

props.name: scopes
props.description: the scopes the user has authorized the application for

props.name: expires
props.description: when the access token expires

props.name: user
props.description: the user who has authorized, if the user has authorized with the identify scope
